sResourceArchiveList.default: SKYRIM - MISC.BSA, SKYRIM - SHADERS.BSA, SKYRIM - TEXTURES.BSA, SKYRIM - MESHES.BSA, SKYRIM - ANIMATIONS.BSA, SKYRIM - VOICES.BSA, SKYRIM - VOICES2.BSA, SKYRIM - INTERFACE.BSA, SKYRIM - SOUNDS.BSA

sResourcePrefixList.default: TEXTURES\, MESHES\, FACEGEN\, INTERFACE\ , MUSIC\, SOUND\, SCRIPTS\, MAXHEIGHTS\, VIS\, GRASS\, STRINGS\

fAudioMasterVolume.description: Controls the master volume. 1.0 is the maximum you can set using the InGame UI.

fVal0.description: Footstep Volume. (1.00 is the maximum you can set from the UI)

fVal1.description: Voice Volume. (1.00 is the maximum you can set from the UI)

fVal2.description: Music Volume. (1.00 is the maximum you can set from the UI)

fVal3.description: Effect Volume. (1.00 is the maximum you can set from the UI)

bBackgroundCellLoads.description: Load certain data files in background. Supposed to reduce stuttering while increasing load times and memory usage

bBackgroundLoadLipFiles.description: Load certain data files in background. Supposed to reduce stuttering while increasing load times and memory usage

bLoadBackgroundFaceGen.description: Load certain data files in background. Supposed to reduce stuttering while increasing load times and memory usage

bLoadHelmetsInBackground.description: Load certain data files in background. Supposed to reduce stuttering while increasing load times and memory usage

bSelectivePurgeUnusedOnFastTravel.description: Unload unused data on fast travel. Can reduce memory usage for users with little RAM.

bUseBlurShader.description: Enables a blur effect when HDR is disabled. Please note: This is read by the skyrim launcher but not by skyrim itself.

bAlwaysRunByDefault.description: If true, the user will run by default, otherwise walk slowly

bDrawLandShadows.description: if true, draw dynamic shadows from landmass like rocks

bFXAAEnabled.description: Post-processing Anti-Aliasing. Better performance than Multi Sampling but worse quality.

fInteriorShadowDistance.description: Distance at which interior shadows are drawn. Higher distance will reduce shadow quality. Very little actual effect.

fShadowBiasScale.description: Controls which objects cast shadows. Low value means more shadows.

fShadowDistance.description: Range at which shadows are drawn. The higher this value the lower the quality of shadows.

fTreesMidLODSwitchDist.description: Distance up to which higher detail trees are displayed

iBlurDeferredShadowMask.description: Control blurring of the shadow map. Lower values lead to sharper shadows that may look glitchy

iMaxAnisotropy.description: Quality of the anisotropic filtering. Higher means better quality at a small performance hit

iMultiSample.description: Anti Aliasing Quality. Higher means better quality at a performance hit. It may be better to disable AA here and activate it in the driver.

iPresentInterval.description: enable or disable an engine-specific vsync-implementation. May reduce mouse lag and increase fps. May cause visual glitches.

iShadowMapResolution.description: Texture size of shadow maps. Higher value means nicer shadows but more VRAM usage and less FPS.

iShadowMapResolutionSecondary.description: Supposed to control shadow map resolution. This is NOT used in Skyrim, not sure if other games use it

iShadowMapResolutionPrimary.description: Supposed to control shadow map resoluton. This is NOT used in Skyrim, not sure if other games use it

iShadowMaskQuarter.description: Controls quality of interior shadows. High values have more jagged edges. Very high values can cause crashes. 0 disables dynamic shadows but not static ones.

sD3DDevice.description: Identifier for your video card. Only relevant to the launcher

bShowQuestMarkers.description: disable to hide quest markers in the game

bBorderRegionsEnabled.description: enables (true) or disables (false) the invisible wall around the game world

bPreemptivelyUnloadCells.description: If active, the game will try to predict when cells become unneeded and unloads them. This saves RAM but can cause stutters.

iPreloadSizeLimit.description: Limit (in bytes) of data to preload. Reasonable values are between the default (25MB) and 256MB

sLocalSavePath.description: Directory where save games are stored. This value is ignored if you enabled profile-local save games in MO!

uExterior Cell Buffer.description: Number of outdoor-cells to buffer in RAM. Higher value means more Memory usage, longer load times but smoother FPS.

uGridsToLoad.description: Number of grids to preload. Higher values increase graphics quality at the cost of performance and can cause instability. Has to be uneven. 5, 7 or 9 seem to be the most practical values.

uInterior Cell Buffer.description: Number of indoor-cells to buffer in RAM. Higher value means more Memory usage, longer load times but smoother FPS.

sGeneralMasterMismatchWarning.default: One or more plugins could not find the correct versions of the master files they depend on. Errors may occur during load or game play. Check the "Warnings.txt" file for more information.

sMasterMismatchWarning.default: One of the files that "%s" is dependent on has changed since the last save.

sGeneralMasterMismatchWarning.default: One or more plugins could not find the correct versions of the master files they depend on. Errors may occur during load or game play. Check the "Warnings.txt" file for more information.

sMasterMismatchWarning.default: One of the files that "%s" is dependent on has changed since the last save.

bAllowCreateGrass.description: Controls whether grass is drawn at all

fGrassStartFadeDistance.description: Controls the distance up to which grass is drawn

iMinGrassSize.description: Controls the size of grass patches

bDoDepthOfField.description: Controls depth of field effect on various menu screens.

bDoRadialBlur.description: controls radial blur effect in certain situations (like combat)

iRadialBlurLevel.description: strength of radial blur effect in certain situations (like combat)

bShowCompass.description: Set to false to hide the compass on the upper screen edge

fSafeZoneX.description: Margin between screen border and HUD elements (4:3 resolutions)

fSafeZoneXWide.description: Margin between screen border and HUD elements (wide screen resolutions)

fSafeZoneY.description: Margin between screen border and HUD elements (4:3 resolutions)

fSafeZoneYWide.description: Margin between screen border and HUD elements (wide screen resolutions)

fLODFadeOutMultActors.description: Level of Detail distance for actors. The maximum value in the UI is 15.0

fLODFadeOutMultItems.description: Level of Detail distance for items. The maximum value in the UI is 15.0

fLODFadeOutMultObjects.description: Level of Detail distance for objects. The maximum value in the UI is 15.0

fHUDOpacity.description: Opacity of the HUD. Reduce for a transparent hud.

uLockedObjectMapLOD.description: Level of detail of objects on the map

uLockedTerrainLOD.description: Level of detail of the terrain on the map

bEnableLogging.description: Check to enable logging of messages from scripts. This may decrease performance slightly.

bEnableProfiling.description: Check to collect profiling information for scripts. This may decreate performance.

bEnableTrace.description: Check to write trace messages from scripts to the log files. No effect if bEnableLogging isnt also enabled.

bLoadDebugInformation.description: Check to allow error messages from scripts to print more detailed information.

uTraceStatusOfQuest.description: Decimal form ID for a quest. All script changes for that quest are logged.

iMaxDesired.description: Maximum number of particles. Notable impact on visual quality and performance

bBackgroundPathing.description: Load certain data files in background. Supposed to reduce stuttering while increasing load times and memory usage

sSaveGameGameVersionOutdated.default: This save game was created on a later version of Skyrim. Please download any updates.

bBloodSplatterEnabled.description: Set to false to display the blood splatter effect on the Screen

fTreeLoadDistance.description: Distance up to which trees are drawn

bRenderSkinnedTrees.description: Controls display of foliage on trees

uiMaxSkinnedTreesToRender.description: If bRenderSkinnedTrees is true, this controls how many trees can have foliage at once

iWaterReflectHeight.description: Resolution of reflection texture. Always set equal to iWaterReflectWidth

iWaterReflectWidth.description: Resolution of reflection texture. Always set equal to iWaterReflectHeight
